description: Red matte Lycra high-waist bike shorts

core:description.text: High-waisted red bike shorts crafted from matte Lycra that sculpt and move with you. The wide waistband supports the core and stays put through sprints or strength training, while flat seams minimize distraction. Matte panels along the sides create a sleek finish that contrasts nicely with the ribbed cotton tank. Wear them with the black longline sports bra for a streamlined studio uniform or layer under an oversized sweatshirt for commute comfort.
